meanings.sent1: The suborbicular table in the room fit perfectly in the corner.
meanings.sent2: The coin had a suborbicular design on one side.
meanings.sent3: The suborbicular pizza my mom made looked like a giant cookie!
meanings.sent4: Her suborbicular face lit up with joy when she saw the surprise.
meanings.sent5: The suborbicular moon shone brightly in the night sky.

meanings.definition: Having a shape that is somewhat circular.
meanings.sent1: The suborbicular rug added a cozy touch to the living room.
meanings.sent2: The suborbicular window allowed plenty of natural light to enter.
meanings.sent3: The suborbicular sandwich was so big it barely fit in the lunchbox!
meanings.sent4: His suborbicular thoughts kept circling back to the same idea.
meanings.sent5: The suborbicular flower bloomed beautifully in the garden.

meanings.definition: Resembling a circle but not perfectly round.
meanings.sent1: The suborbicular clock on the wall ticked loudly.
meanings.sent2: The suborbicular pond in the park was home to many ducks.
meanings.sent3: The suborbicular pancake she made looked more like a blob than a circle!
meanings.sent4: His suborbicular reasoning led to an interesting conclusion.
meanings.sent5: The suborbicular rock skipped across the water's surface.
